nickname.title: Choose your dropkitchen™ username.
nickname.help-warning: Must be at least 3 letters and contain only letters and numbers.
nickname.help-already: This username is already in use.

message.success: Your verification code has been sent.
message.fail: Verification failed. Please check whether the code entered is correct.
message.over: Oops, you've timed out. Please request a new verification code.

deviceOn.title: Push notifications are off.
deviceOn.desc: Turn on notifications to get updates on new artwork.

delete.title: 회원 탈퇴
delete.desc4: 탈퇴한 메일 계정으로 재가입하려면 30일 이후에 가능해요.
delete.desc5: 탈퇴 시 포인트, 디지털 자산, 활동 내역 포함 데이터가 전부 소멸되며 복원은 불가해요.
delete.desc8: 탈퇴 후 30일간 재가입이 불가하고, 재가입 시 신규 회원으로 등록돼요
delete.desc13: 더 나은 드롭키친이 되도록 저희가 더 노력할게요

random.title: Lucky Box
random.desc:
Drumroll...
Let's see what's inside your Lucky Box!

drop.title: Ta-da!
drop.desc:
You got the digital art!
Want to view it in My Gallery?

box.title: Art Drop Box
box.desc:
Tap on ongoing art drops
and collect digital art.

modal.title: Stay up to date on all things art.
modal.context: You'll be notified about the latest art drops, events, and more.

main.alarmAgree: You've agreed to receive notifications on MONTH, DAY, YEAR.

modal.title: Congrats! You acquired a new artwork!
modal.context:
You received 1,000 points.
Ready to check out the artwork in My Gallery?

modal.title: Invite a friend and you both get a gift. It's a win-win!
modal.context: Your friend receives free digital art, and you will receive extra points after they sign up!

invite.title: Invite a friend and you both get a gift. It's a win-win!
invite.desc: Your friend receives free digital art, and you receive extra points when they sign up.
